author: Shelby Robertson
text: So many mixed feelings about college. These last 3 weeks have really shown me how much I have relied on the constant of Alva and NWOSU... today has been one of my worst since I have been home. Feelings of doubt and fear of the uncertainty that my future contains. https://t.co/qrmsxbfebg

author: Shelby Robertson
text:
Years between visits, 4.5 hours away, but never forgotten. 
We have been through thick and thin together.
Relationships come and go.
For me there has always been one steady friend and that is you.
Every brunette needs her crazy Blonde/Red/Green/Purple/Black haired best friend. https://t.co/sXTstkLvBa

author: Shelby Robertson
text:
Sometimes it all works out for the best. Man yesterday was hard, but the 2 hour conversation I got to have with @18Camryn  made everything so much better! 
Here's to hoping today is a great one!

author: Shelby Robertson
text: Just to hear your voice again, I need your great advice. You always knew exactly what I needed to hear, and when to listen and when to speak. So much time has passed I'm not sure what your voice sounded like. https://t.co/ahZRaaNq88

author: Shelby Robertson
text:
Two of my daily motivation slides for this morning! I can't wait to see what God will do with my life!

author: Shelby Robertson
text:
A year and a half to go, just going with the cards I've got, and waiting to see what the next step is! 

Jeremiah 29:11 "'For I Know The Plans I Have For You' Declares the Lord, 'Plans to Prosper You and Not to Harm You, Plans to Give You Hope and a Future"

Here's to the future. https://t.co/Q4wGFrP6Yp
